body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeffrey Rogers and the customer's name is Patricia Barnes.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Solutions. My name is John. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I have a few questions about my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course. May I first have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Jane Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. To verify your identity, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My date of birth is July twenty-third, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also provide the last four digits of your Social Security Number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, Jane. How can I assist you with your account today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need to check the status of my last payment and update my billing address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'll look into that for you right away. Please hold for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for waiting, Jane. Your last payment was received and your billing address has been updated successfully.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great, thank you so much for your help, John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jane. Thank you for your time. Have a wonderful day!
